TagHelpers.Name: Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxAccordion
TagHelpers.Documentation:
Bootstrap accordion component.
Full documentation and demos: https://havit.blazor.eu/components/HxAccordion

BoundAttributes.Name: CssClass
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Additional CSS classes for the accordion container.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ExpandedItemIds
BoundAttributes.Documentation: IDs of the expanded items (if is true, several items can be expanded). Do not use a constant value as it resets the accordion on every roundtrip. Use to set the initial state.

BoundAttributes.Name: ExpandedItemId
BoundAttributes.Documentation: ID of the single expanded item (if is true, use , several items can be expanded). Do not use a constant value as it reverts the accordion to that item on every roundtrip. Use to set the initial state.

BoundAttributes.Name: StayOpen
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Set to <c>true</c> to make accordion items stay open when another item is opened.
            The default is <c>false</c>, opening another item collapses the current item.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: InitialExpandedItemId
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            ID of the item you want to expand at the very beginning (overwrites <see cref="P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxAccordion.ExpandedItemId" /> if set).
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: InitialExpandedItemIds
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            IDs of the items you want to expand at the very beginning (overwrites <see cref="P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxAccordion.ExpandedItemIds" /> if set).
            </summary>

TagHelpers.Name: Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxAccordionItem
TagHelpers.Documentation:
<summary>
            Single item for <see cref="T:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxAccordion" />.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: HeaderTemplate
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Clickable header (always visible).
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: BodyTemplate
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Body (collapsible).
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Id
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            ID of the item (<see cref="P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxAccordion.ExpandedItemId" />). (Gets generated GUID if not set.)
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: OnExpanded
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Raised after the transition to this item (the animation is finished).
            Is not raised for the initial rendering even if the item is not collapsed (no transition happened).
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: OnCollapsed
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Raised after the transition from this item (the animation is finished).
            Is not raised for the initial rendering even if the item is collapsed (no transition happened).
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: CssClass
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Additional CSS class(es) for the accordion item.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: HeaderCssClass
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Additional CSS class(es) for the accordion item header (<c>.accordion-header</c>).
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: BodyCssClass
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Additional CSS class(es) for the accordion item body (<c>.accordion-body</c>).
            </summary>

TagHelpers.Name: Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxBadge
TagHelpers.Documentation:
Bootstrap Badge component.
Full documentation and demos: https://havit.blazor.eu/components/HxBadge

BoundAttributes.Name: Settings
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Set of settings to be applied to the component instance (overrides <see cref="P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxBadge.Defaults" />, overridden by individual parameters).
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Color
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Badge color (background).
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: TextColor
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Color of badge text. Use <see cref="P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxBadge.Color" /> for the background color.
            The default is <see cref="F:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.ThemeColor.None" /> (color automatically selected to work with the chosen background color).
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Type
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Badge type - Regular or rounded-pills. The default is <see cref="F:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.BadgeType.Regular" />.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: CssClass
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Any additional CSS class to apply.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: AdditionalAttributes
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Additional attributes to be splatted onto an underlying HTML element.
            </summary>

TagHelpers.Name: Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxButton
TagHelpers.Documentation:
Button (<button type="button">). See also Bootstrap Buttons.
Full documentation and demos: https://havit.blazor.eu/components/HxButton

BoundAttributes.Name: Settings
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Set of settings to be applied to the component instance (overrides <see cref="P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxButton.Defaults" />, overridden by individual parameters).
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Text
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Text of the button.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ChildContent
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Button content.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Icon
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Icon to render into the button.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: IconPlacement
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Position of the icon within the button. The default is <see cref="F:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.ButtonIconPlacement.Start" /> (configurable through <see cref="P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxButton.Defaults" />).
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Color
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
Bootstrap button style - theme color.
The default is taken from ( if not customized).

BoundAttributes.Name: Size
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Button size. The default is <see cref="F:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.ButtonSize.Regular" />.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Outline
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            <see href="https://getbootstrap.com/docs/5.3/components/buttons/#outline-buttons">Bootstrap "outline" button</see> style.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: CssClass
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
Custom CSS class to render with the <button />.
When using you might want to use instead of to get the desired result.

BoundAttributes.Name: IconCssClass
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            CSS class to be rendered with the button icon.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Enabled
BoundAttributes.Documentation: <inheritdoc cref="P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Infrastructure.ICascadeEnabledComponent.Enabled" />

BoundAttributes.Name: EditContext
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Associated <see cref="P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxButton.EditContext" />.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: FormId
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Specifies the form the button belongs to.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Tooltip
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
Tooltip text.
If set, a span wrapper will be rendered around the <button />. For most scenarios, you will then use instead of .

BoundAttributes.Name: TooltipPlacement
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Tooltip placement.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: TooltipCssClass
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Custom CSS class to render with the tooltip.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: TooltipWrapperCssClass
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
Custom CSS class to render with the tooltip span wrapper of the <button />.
If set, the span wrapper will be rendered no matter whether the text is set or not.

BoundAttributes.Name: OnClick
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Raised after the button is clicked.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: OnValidClick
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Raised after the button is clicked and EditContext validation succeeds.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: OnInvalidClick
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Raised after the button is clicked and EditContext validation fails.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: OnClickStopPropagation
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Stops onClick-event propagation. Default is <c>true</c>.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: OnClickPreventDefault
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Prevents the default action for the onclick event. Default is <c>false</c>.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Spinner
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Sets the state of the embedded <see cref="T:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxSpinner" />.
            Leave <c>null</c> if you want automated spinner when any of the <see cref="P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxButton.OnClick" /> handlers is running.
            You can set an explicit <c>false</c> constant to disable (override) the spinner automation.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: SingleClickProtection
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Sets <c>false</c> if you want to allow multiple <see cref="P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxButton.OnClick" /> handlers in parallel. Default is <c>true</c>.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: AdditionalAttributes
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Additional attributes to be splatted onto an underlying <c><button></c> element.
            </summary>

Basic calendar building block. Used for and implementation.
Full documentation and demos: https://havit.blazor.eu/components/HxCalendar

BoundAttributes.Name: Settings
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Set of settings to be applied to the component instance (overrides <see cref="P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxCalendar.Defaults" />, overridden by individual parameters).
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Value
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Date selected.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ValueChanged
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Raised when the selected date changes.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: DisplayMonth
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Month to display.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: DisplayMonthChanged
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Raised when the month selection changes.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: MinDate
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
First date selectable from the calendar.
Default is 1.1.1900 (configurable from ).

BoundAttributes.Name: MaxDate
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
Last date selectable from the calendar.
Default is 31.12.2099 (configurable from ).

BoundAttributes.Name: DateCustomizationProvider
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Allows customization of the dates in calendar.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: KeyboardNavigation
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Indicates whether the keyboard navigation is enabled. When disabled, the calendar renders <c>tabindex="-1"</c> on interactive elements.
            Default is <c>true</c> (tabindex attribute is not rendered).
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: TimeProvider
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
TimeProvider is resolved in the following order:
1. TimeProvider from this parameter
2. Settings TimeProvider (configurable from )
3. Defaults TimeProvider (configurable from )
4. TimeProvider from DependencyInjection

TagHelpers.Name: Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxCarousel
TagHelpers.Documentation:
A slideshow component for cycling through elementsimages or slides of textlike a carousel.
Full documentation and demos: https://havit.blazor.eu/components/HxCarousel

BoundAttributes.Name: ChildContent
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Content of the carousel.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: CssClass
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Carousel CSS class. Added to root div <c>.carousel</c>.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Controls
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Display controls to switch between slides.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Indicators
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Display indicators showing which slide is active. Can also be used to switch between slides.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Dark
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Show controls, captions, etc. with dark colors.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Crossfade
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Animate slides with a fade transition instead of sliding.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Interval
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Delay for automatically switching slides. Default is <c>3000 ms</c>.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: TouchSwiping
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Enable or disable swiping left/right on touchscreen devices to move between slides.
            Default is <c>true</c> (enabled).
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: OnSlide
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Is fired when the current slide is changed (at the very start of the sliding transition).
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: OnSlid
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Is fired when the current slide is changed (once the transition is completed).
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Ride
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Carousel ride (autoplay) behavior. Default is <see cref="F:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.CarouselRide.Carousel" /> (autoplays the carousel on load).
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Pause
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Carousel pause behavior. Default is <see cref="F:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.CarouselPause.Hover" /> (carousel will stop sliding on hover).
            </summary>

TagHelpers.Name: Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxChipList
TagHelpers.Documentation:
Presents a list of chips as badges.
Usually used to present filter criteria gathered by .
Full documentation and demos: https://havit.blazor.eu/components/HxChipList

BoundAttributes.Name: Settings
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Set of settings to be applied to the component instance (overrides <see cref="P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxChipList.Defaults" />, overridden by individual parameters).
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Chips
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Chips to be presented.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ChipBadgeSettings
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Settings for the <see cref="T:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxBadge" /> used to render chips.
            The default brings <c>Color="<see cref="F:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.ThemeColor.Secondary" />".</c>
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: CssClass
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Additional CSS class.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: OnChipRemoveClick
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Called when the chip remove button is clicked.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: OnResetClick
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Called when the reset button is clicked (when using the ready-made reset button, not the <see cref="P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxChipList.ResetButtonTemplate" /> where you are expected to wire the event on your own).
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ShowResetButton
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Enables or disables the reset button. The default is false (can be changed with HxChipList.Defaults.ShowResetButton).

BoundAttributes.Name: ResetButtonText
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Text of the reset button.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ResetButtonTemplate
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Template for the reset button.
            If used, the <see cref="P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxChipList.ResetButtonText" /> is ignored and the <see cref="P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxChipList.OnResetClick" /> callback is not triggered (you are expected to wire the reset logic on your own).
            </summary>

TagHelpers.Documentation:
Bootstrap 5 Collapse component.
Full documentation and demos: https://havit.blazor.eu/components/HxCollapse

BoundAttributes.Name: Id
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Element ID. To be referenced by <see cref="P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxCollapseToggleButton.CollapseTarget" />.
            (Autogenerated GUID if not set explicitly.)
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: CollapseDirection
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Direction of the animation.
            Default is <see cref="F:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.CollapseDirection.Vertical" />.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Parent
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            If a parent is provided, then all collapsible elements under the specified parent will be closed when this collapsible item is shown.
            (Similar to traditional accordion behavior.)
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: CssClass
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Additional CSS class.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: InitiallyExpanded
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Determines whether the collapse will be open or closed (expanded or collapsed) when first rendered.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ChildContent
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Content of the collapse.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: OnShown
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            This event is fired when a collapse element has become visible to the user (will wait for CSS transitions to complete).
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: OnHidden
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            This event is fired when a collapse element has been hidden from the user (will wait for CSS transitions to complete).
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: AdditionalAttributes
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Additional attributes to be splatted onto an underlying <c>div</c> element.
            </summary>

TagHelpers.Name: Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxCollapseToggleButton
TagHelpers.Documentation:
<summary>
            Bootstrap Collapse toggle (in the form of a button) which triggers the <see cref="T:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxCollapse" /> to toggle.
            Derived from <see cref="T:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxButton" /> (including <see cref="P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxButton.Defaults" /> inheritance).
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: CollapseTarget
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Target selector of the toggle.
            Use <c>#id</c> to reference a single <see cref="T:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxCollapse" /> or <c>.class</c> for multiple <see cref="T:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxCollapse" />s.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Settings
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Set of settings to be applied to the component instance (overrides <see cref="P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxButton.Defaults" />, overridden by individual parameters).

            </summary>

<summary>

            </summary>

If set, a span wrapper will be rendered around the <button />. For most scenarios, you will then use instead of .

            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: TooltipWrapperCssClass

Custom CSS class to render with the tooltip span wrapper of the <button />.

BoundAttributes.Name: OnClick
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: OnValidClick

            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: OnInvalidClick
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Raised after the button is clicked and EditContext validation fails.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: OnClickStopPropagation
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Stops onClick-event propagation. Default is <c>true</c>.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: OnClickPreventDefault
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Prevents the default action for the onclick event. Default is <c>false</c>.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Spinner
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Sets the state of the embedded <see cref="T:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxSpinner" />.
            Leave <c>null</c> if you want automated spinner when any of the <see cref="P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxButton.OnClick" /> handlers is running.
            You can set an explicit <c>false</c> constant to disable (override) the spinner automation.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: SingleClickProtection
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Sets <c>false</c> if you want to allow multiple <see cref="P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxButton.OnClick" /> handlers in parallel. Default is <c>true</c>.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: AdditionalAttributes
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Additional attributes to be splatted onto an underlying <c><button></c> element.
            </summary>

TagHelpers.Name: Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxDropdown
TagHelpers.Documentation:
Bootstrap 5 Dropdown generic component.
For buttons with dropdowns, use the more specific .
Full documentation and demos: https://havit.blazor.eu/components/HxDropdown

BoundAttributes.Name: Direction
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The direction in which the dropdown is opened.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: AutoClose
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            By default, the dropdown menu is closed when clicking inside or outside the dropdown menu (<see cref="F:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.DropdownAutoClose.True" />).
            You can use the AutoClose parameter to change this behavior of the dropdown.
            See <see href="https://getbootstrap.com/docs/5.3/components/dropdowns/#auto-close-behavior">https://getbootstrap.com/docs/5.3/components/dropdowns/#auto-close-behavior</see> for more information.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: CssClass
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Any additional CSS class to apply.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: AdditionalAttributes
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Additional attributes to be splatted onto an underlying <c>div</c> element.
            </summary>

TagHelpers.Name: Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxDropdownToggleButton
TagHelpers.Documentation:
<summary>
            <see href="https://getbootstrap.com/docs/5.3/components/dropdowns/">Bootstrap Dropdown</see> toggle button which triggers the <see cref="T:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxDropdownButtonGroup" /> to open.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: DropdownOffset
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Offset <c>(<see href="https://popper.js.org/docs/v2/modifiers/offset/#skidding-1">skidding</see>, <see href="https://popper.js.org/docs/v2/modifiers/offset/#distance-1">distance</see>)</c>
            of the dropdown relative to its target.  Default is <c>(0, 2)</c>.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: DropdownReference
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Reference element of the dropdown menu. Accepts the values of <c>toggle</c> (default), <c>parent</c>,
            an HTMLElement reference (e.g. <c>#id</c>) or an object providing <c>getBoundingClientRect</c>.
            For more information, refer to Popper's <see href="https://popper.js.org/docs/v2/constructors/#createpopper">constructor docs</see>
            and <see href="https://popper.js.org/docs/v2/virtual-elements/">virtual element docs</see>.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: OnShown
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Fired when the dropdown has been made visible to the user and CSS transitions have completed.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: OnHidden
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Fired when the dropdown has finished being hidden from the user and CSS transitions have completed.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: AutoClose
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            By default, the dropdown menu is closed when clicking inside or outside the dropdown menu (<see cref="F:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.DropdownAutoClose.True" />).
            You can use the AutoClose parameter to change this behavior of the dropdown.
            <see href="https://getbootstrap.com/docs/5.3/components/dropdowns/#auto-close-behavior">https://getbootstrap.com/docs/5.3/components/dropdowns/#auto-close-behavior</see>.
            The parameter can be used to override the settings of the <see cref="P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxDropdownToggleButton.DropdownContainer" /> component or to specify the auto-close behavior when the component is not used.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Settings
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Set of settings to be applied to the component instance (overrides <see cref="P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxButton.Defaults" />, overridden by individual parameters).
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Text
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Text of the button.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ChildContent
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Button content.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Icon
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Icon to render into the button.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: IconPlacement
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Position of the icon within the button. The default is <see cref="F:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.ButtonIconPlacement.Start" /> (configurable through <see cref="P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxButton.Defaults" />).
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Documentation:
Bootstrap button style - theme color.
The default is taken from ( if not customized).

<summary>
            <see href="https://getbootstrap.com/docs/5.3/components/buttons/#outline-buttons">Bootstrap "outline" button</see> style.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: CssClass
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
Custom CSS class to render with the <button />.
When using you might want to use instead of to get the desired result.

BoundAttributes.Name: IconCssClass
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            CSS class to be rendered with the button icon.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Enabled
BoundAttributes.Documentation: <inheritdoc cref="P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Infrastructure.ICascadeEnabledComponent.Enabled" />

BoundAttributes.Name: EditContext
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Associated <see cref="P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxButton.EditContext" />.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: FormId
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Specifies the form the button belongs to.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Tooltip
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
Tooltip text.
If set, a span wrapper will be rendered around the <button />. For most scenarios, you will then use instead of .

BoundAttributes.Name: TooltipPlacement
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Tooltip placement.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: TooltipCssClass
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Custom CSS class to render with the tooltip.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: TooltipWrapperCssClass
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
Custom CSS class to render with the tooltip span wrapper of the <button />.
If set, the span wrapper will be rendered no matter whether the text is set or not.

BoundAttributes.Name: OnClick
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Raised after the button is clicked.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: OnValidClick
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Raised after the button is clicked and EditContext validation succeeds.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: OnInvalidClick
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Raised after the button is clicked and EditContext validation fails.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: OnClickStopPropagation
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Stops onClick-event propagation. Default is <c>true</c>.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: OnClickPreventDefault
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Prevents the default action for the onclick event. Default is <c>false</c>.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Spinner
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Sets the state of the embedded <see cref="T:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxSpinner" />.
            Leave <c>null</c> if you want automated spinner when any of the <see cref="P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxButton.OnClick" /> handlers is running.
            You can set an explicit <c>false</c> constant to disable (override) the spinner automation.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: SingleClickProtection
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Sets <c>false</c> if you want to allow multiple <see cref="P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxButton.OnClick" /> handlers in parallel. Default is <c>true</c>.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: AdditionalAttributes
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Additional attributes to be splatted onto an underlying <c><button></c> element.
            </summary>

TagHelpers.Name: Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxDropdownToggleElement
TagHelpers.Documentation:
<summary>
            <see href="https://getbootstrap.com/docs/5.3/components/dropdowns/">Bootstrap Dropdown</see> toggle button which triggers the <see cref="T:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxDropdown" /> to open.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ElementName
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the name of the element to render. Default is <c>span</c>.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Caret
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
Gets or sets whether to display caret in the toggle.
Default is false.

BoundAttributes.Name: DropdownReference
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Reference element of the dropdown menu. Accepts the values of <c>toggle</c> (default), <c>parent</c>,
            an HTMLElement reference (e.g. <c>#id</c>) or an object providing <c>getBoundingClientRect</c>.
            For more information, refer to Popper's <see href="https://popper.js.org/docs/v2/constructors/#createpopper">constructor docs</see>
            and <see href="https://popper.js.org/docs/v2/virtual-elements/">virtual element docs</see>.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: DropdownOffset
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Offset <c>(<see href="https://popper.js.org/docs/v2/modifiers/offset/#skidding-1">skidding</see>, <see href="https://popper.js.org/docs/v2/modifiers/offset/#distance-1">distance</see>)</c>
            of the dropdown relative to its target. Default is <c>(0, 2)</c>.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: CssClass
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Custom CSS class to render with the toggle element.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: AutoClose
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            By default, the dropdown menu is closed when clicking inside or outside the dropdown menu (<see cref="F:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.DropdownAutoClose.True" />).
            You can use the AutoClose parameter to change this behavior of the dropdown.
            <see href="https://getbootstrap.com/docs/5.3/components/dropdowns/#auto-close-behavior">https://getbootstrap.com/docs/5.3/components/dropdowns/#auto-close-behavior</see>.
            The parameter can be used to override the settings of the <see cref="P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxDropdownToggleElement.DropdownContainer" /> component or to specify the auto-close behavior when the component is not used.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: OnShown
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Fired when the dropdown has been made visible to the user and CSS transitions have completed.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: OnHidden
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Fired when the dropdown has finished being hidden from the user and CSS transitions have completed.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Value
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Value for cases when the dropdown is used as an input element.

BoundAttributes.Name: ValueChanged
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Raised when the value changes (binds to onchange input event).

TagHelpers.Name: Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxInputFile
TagHelpers.Documentation:
Wraps as a Bootstrap form control (including Label etc.)
Full documentation and demos: https://havit.blazor.eu/components/HxInputFile

BoundAttributes.Name: Settings
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Set of settings to be applied to the component instance (overrides <see cref="P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxInputFile.Defaults" />, overridden by individual parameters).
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: UploadUrl
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            URL of the server endpoint receiving the files.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: OnChange
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the event callback that will be invoked when the collection of selected files changes.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: OnProgress
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Raised during running file upload (the frequency depends on browser implementation).
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: OnFileUploaded
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Raised after a file is uploaded (for every single file separately).
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: OnUploadCompleted
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Raised when all files are uploaded (after all <see cref="P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxInputFile.OnFileUploaded" /> events).
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Multiple
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Single <c>false</c> or multiple <c>true</c> files upload.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: MaxParallelUploads
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Maximum number of concurrent uploads. The default is <c>6</c> (from <see cref="T:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.HxInputFileCore" />).
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Accept
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Takes as its value a comma-separated list of one or more file types, or unique file type specifiers, describing which file types to allow.
            <see href="https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Attributes/accept">MDN Web Docs - HTML attribute: accept</see>.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: MaxFileSize
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The maximum file size in bytes.
            When exceeded, the <see cref="P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxInputFile.OnFileUploaded" /> returns <c>413-RequestEntityTooLarge</c> as <see cref="P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.FileUploadedEventArgs.ResponseStatus" />.
            The default is <c>null</c> (unlimited).
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Label
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Label to render before input (or after input for Checkbox).		
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: LabelTemplate
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Label to render before input (or after input for Checkbox).
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Hint
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Hint to render after input as form-text.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: HintTemplate
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Hint to render after input as form-text.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: CssClass
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Custom CSS class to render with the wrapping div.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: LabelCssClass
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Custom CSS class to render with the label.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: InputSize
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Size of the input.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: InputCssClass
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Custom CSS class to render with the input element.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Enabled
BoundAttributes.Documentation: <inheritdoc cref="P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Infrastructure.ICascadeEnabledComponent.Enabled" />

TagHelpers.Name: Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxAutosuggest<TItem, TValue>
TagHelpers.Documentation:
Component for single item selection with dynamic suggestions (based on typed characters).
Full documentation and demos: https://havit.blazor.eu/components/HxAutosuggest Defaults are located in a separate non-generic type .

BoundAttributes.Name: TItem
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Specifies the type of the type parameter TItem for the Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxAutosuggest<TItem, TValue> component.

BoundAttributes.Name: TValue
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Specifies the type of the type parameter TValue for the Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxAutosuggest<TItem, TValue> component.

BoundAttributes.Name: Settings
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Set of settings to be applied to the component instance (overrides <see cref="P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxAutosuggest.Defaults" />, overridden by individual parameters).
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: DataProvider
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Method (delegate) that provides data for the suggestions.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ValueSelector
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Selects a value from an item.
            Not required when <c>TValue</c> is the same as <c>TItem</c>.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: TextSelector
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Selects the text to display from an item.
            When not set, <c>ToString()</c> is used.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ItemTemplate
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Template to display an item.
            When not set, <see cref="P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxAutosuggest`2.TextSelector" /> is used.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: EmptyTemplate
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Template to display when items are empty.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: SearchIcon
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Icon displayed in the input when no item is selected.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ClearIcon
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Icon displayed in the input on the selection clear button when an item is selected.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: MinimumLength
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The minimal number of characters to start suggesting.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Delay
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The debounce delay in milliseconds.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Placeholder
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            A short hint displayed in the input field before the user enters a value.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: InputSize
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The size of the input.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: LabelType
BoundAttributes.Documentation: <inheritdoc cref="T:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.LabelType" />

BoundAttributes.Name: ItemFromValueResolver
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Returns the corresponding item for the (selected) value.
            </summary>
            <remarks>
            We do not have a full list of possible items to be able to select one by value.
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: InputGroupStartText
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The input-group at the beginning of the input.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: InputGroupStartTemplate
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The input-group at the beginning of the input.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: InputGroupEndText
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
The input-group at the end of the input.
Hides the search icon when used!

BoundAttributes.Name: InputGroupEndTemplate
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
The input-group at the end of the input.
Hides the search icon when used!

BoundAttributes.Name: ValidationMessageMode
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
Specifies how the validation message should be displayed.
The default is , you can override the application-wide default for all inputs in .

BoundAttributes.Name: Label
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The label text.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: LabelTemplate
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The label content.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Hint
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The hint to render after the input as form-text.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: HintTemplate
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The hint to render after the input as form-text.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: CssClass
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The custom CSS class to render with the wrapping div.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: LabelCssClass
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The custom CSS class to render with the label.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: InputCssClass
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The custom CSS class to render with the input element.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: GenerateChip
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            When <c>true</c>, <see cref="T:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxChipGenerator" /> is used to generate chip item(s). The default is <c>true</c>.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ChipTemplate
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The chip template.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Enabled
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            When <c>null</c> (default), the <c>Enabled</c> value is received from the cascading <see cref="P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxInputBase`1.FormState" />.
            When the value is <c>false</c>, the input is rendered as disabled.
            To set multiple controls as disabled, use <seealso cref="T:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.HxFormState" />.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: AdditionalAttributes
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets a collection of additional attributes that will be applied to the created element.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Value
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the value of the input. This should be used with two-way binding.
            </summary>
            <example>
            @bind-Value="model.PropertyName"
            </example>

BoundAttributes.Name: ValueChanged
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets a callback that updates the bound value.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ValueExpression
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets an expression that identifies the bound value.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: DisplayName
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the display name for this field.
            <para>This value is used when generating error messages when the input value fails to parse correctly.</para>
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Context
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Specifies the parameter name for all child content expressions.

TagHelpers.Documentation:
Component for single item selection with dynamic suggestions (based on typed characters).
Full documentation and demos: https://havit.blazor.eu/components/HxAutosuggest Defaults are located in a separate non-generic type .

BoundAttributes.Name: TItem
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Specifies the type of the type parameter TItem for the Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxAutosuggest<TItem, TValue> component.

BoundAttributes.Name: TValue
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Specifies the type of the type parameter TValue for the Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxAutosuggest<TItem, TValue> component.

BoundAttributes.Name: Settings
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Set of settings to be applied to the component instance (overrides <see cref="P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxAutosuggest.Defaults" />, overridden by individual parameters).
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: DataProvider
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Method (delegate) that provides data for the suggestions.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ValueSelector
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Selects a value from an item.
            Not required when <c>TValue</c> is the same as <c>TItem</c>.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: TextSelector
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Selects the text to display from an item.
            When not set, <c>ToString()</c> is used.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ItemTemplate
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Template to display an item.
            When not set, <see cref="P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxAutosuggest`2.TextSelector" /> is used.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: EmptyTemplate
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Template to display when items are empty.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: SearchIcon
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Icon displayed in the input when no item is selected.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ClearIcon
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Icon displayed in the input on the selection clear button when an item is selected.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: MinimumLength
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The minimal number of characters to start suggesting.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Delay
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The debounce delay in milliseconds.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Placeholder
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            A short hint displayed in the input field before the user enters a value.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: InputSize
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The size of the input.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: LabelType
BoundAttributes.Documentation: <inheritdoc cref="T:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.LabelType" />

BoundAttributes.Name: ItemFromValueResolver
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Returns the corresponding item for the (selected) value.
            </summary>
            <remarks>
            We do not have a full list of possible items to be able to select one by value.
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: InputGroupStartText
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The input-group at the beginning of the input.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: InputGroupStartTemplate
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The input-group at the beginning of the input.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: InputGroupEndText
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
The input-group at the end of the input.
Hides the search icon when used!

BoundAttributes.Name: InputGroupEndTemplate
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
The input-group at the end of the input.
Hides the search icon when used!

BoundAttributes.Name: ValidationMessageMode
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
Specifies how the validation message should be displayed.
The default is , you can override the application-wide default for all inputs in .

BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The label text.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: LabelTemplate
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>

            </summary>

<summary>
            The hint to render after the input as form-text.
            </summary>

<summary>

BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>

            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ChipTemplate
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The chip template.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Enabled
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            When <c>null</c> (default), the <c>Enabled</c> value is received from the cascading <see cref="P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxInputBase`1.FormState" />.
            When the value is <c>false</c>, the input is rendered as disabled.
            To set multiple controls as disabled, use <seealso cref="T:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.HxFormState" />.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: AdditionalAttributes
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets a collection of additional attributes that will be applied to the created element.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Value
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the value of the input. This should be used with two-way binding.
            </summary>
            <example>
            @bind-Value="model.PropertyName"
            </example>

BoundAttributes.Name: ValueChanged
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets a callback that updates the bound value.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ValueExpression
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets an expression that identifies the bound value.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: DisplayName
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the display name for this field.
            <para>This value is used when generating error messages when the input value fails to parse correctly.</para>
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Documentation: Specifies the parameter name for all child content expressions.

TagHelpers.Name: Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxCheckbox
TagHelpers.Documentation:
Checkbox input.
(Replaces the former HxInputCheckbox component which was dropped in v 4.0.0.) Full documentation and demos: https://havit.blazor.eu/components/HxCheckbox

BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            CSS class to apply to the text.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Inline
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Allows grouping checkboxes on the same horizontal row by rendering them inline. The default value is <c>false</c>.
            This only works when there is no label, no hint, and no validation message.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Reverse
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Put the checkbox on the opposite side - first text, then checkbox.
            </summary>

Renders a multi-selection list of controls.
Full documentation and demos: https://havit.blazor.eu/components/HxCheckboxList

BoundAttributes.Name: TValue

            Not required when TValue is the same as TItem.

BoundAttributes.Documentation:

            Selects the value for item sorting. When not set, the <see cref="P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxCheckboxList`2.ItemTextSelector" /> property will be used.
            If you need complex sorting, pre-sort the data manually or create a custom comparable property.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ItemTextSelector
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Selects the text to display from the item.
            When not set, <c>ToString()</c> is used.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ItemValueSelector
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Selects the value from the item.
            Not required when TValue is the same as TItem.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ItemSortKeySelector
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Selects the value for item sorting. When not set, the <see cref="P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxCheckboxList`2.ItemTextSelector" /> property will be used.
            If you need complex sorting, pre-sort the data manually or create a custom comparable property.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: AutoSort
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            When <c>true</c>, items are sorted before displaying in the select.
            The default value is <c>true</c>.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Inline
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Enabled
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            When <c>null</c> (default), the <c>Enabled</c> value is received from the cascading <see cref="P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxInputBase`1.FormState" />.
            When the value is <c>false</c>, the input is rendered as disabled.

Date picker. Form input component for entering a date.
Full documentation and demos: https://havit.blazor.eu/components/HxInputDate Defaults are located in a separate non-generic type .

BoundAttributes.Name: TValue

            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ShowPredefinedDates
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            When enabled (default is <c>true</c>), shows predefined days (from <see cref="P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxInputDate`1.PredefinedDates" />, e.g. Today).
            </summary>

            Used with <c>String.Format(...)</c>, <c>{0}</c> is replaced by <c>Label</c> property, <c>{1}</c> name of bounded property.

BoundAttributes.Name: ShowClearButton
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
Indicates whether the Clear button in the dropdown calendar should be visible.
The default is true (configurable in ).

BoundAttributes.Name: MinDate
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
The first date selectable from the dropdown calendar.
The default is 1.1.1900 (configurable from ).

BoundAttributes.Name: MaxDate
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
The last date selectable from the dropdown calendar.
The default is 31.12.2099 (configurable from ).

BoundAttributes.Name: CalendarDateCustomizationProvider
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
Allows customization of the dates in the dropdown calendar.
The default customization is configurable with .

TagHelpers.Name: Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxInputDateRange
TagHelpers.Documentation:
Date range picker. Form input component for entering a start date and an end date.
Full documentation and demos: https://havit.blazor.eu/components/HxInputDateRange

BoundAttributes.Name: Settings
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Set of settings to be applied to the component instance (overrides <see cref="P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxInputDateRange.Defaults" />, overridden by individual parameters).
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ShowPredefinedDateRanges
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            When enabled (default is <c>true</c>), shows predefined days (from <see cref="P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxInputDateRange.PredefinedDateRanges" />, e.g. Today).
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: PredefinedDateRanges
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Predefined dates to be displayed.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: InputSize
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Size of the input.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: FromParsingErrorMessage
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the error message used when displaying a "from" parsing error.
            Used with <c>String.Format(...)</c>, <c>{0}</c> is replaced by the Label property, <c>{1}</c> is replaced by the name of the bounded property.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ToParsingErrorMessage
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the error message used when displaying a "to" parsing error.
            Used with <c>String.Format(...)</c>, <c>{0}</c> is replaced by the Label property, <c>{1}</c> is replaced by the name of the bounded property.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ShowClearButton
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
Indicates whether the Clear button in the dropdown calendar should be visible.
The default is true (configurable in ).

BoundAttributes.Name: MinDate
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
The first date selectable from the dropdown calendar.
The default is 1.1.1900 (configurable from ).

BoundAttributes.Name: MaxDate
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
The last date selectable from the dropdown calendar.
The default is 31.12.2099 (configurable from ).

BoundAttributes.Name: CalendarDateCustomizationProvider
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
Allows customization of the dates in the dropdown calendars.
The default customization is configurable with .

BoundAttributes.Name: FromCalendarDisplayMonth
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The month to display in the from calendar when no start date is selected.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ToCalendarDisplayMonth
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The month to display in the to calendar when no end date or start date is selected. It will default to <see cref="P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxInputDateRange.FromCalendarDisplayMonth" />.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: TimeProvider
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
TimeProvider is resolved in the following order:
1. TimeProvider from this parameter
2. Settings TimeProvider (configurable from )
3. Defaults TimeProvider (configurable from )
4. TimeProvider from DependencyInjection

BoundAttributes.Name: ValidationMessageMode
BoundAttributes.Documentation:

The default is , you can override the application-wide default for all inputs in .

TagHelpers.Documentation:
Numeric input.
Full documentation and demos: https://havit.blazor.eu/components/HxInputNumber Defaults located in separate non-generic type . Supported values: byte (Byte), sbyte (SByte), short (Int16), ushort(UInt16), int (Int32), uint(UInt32), long (Int64), ulong(UInt64), float (Single), double (Double) and decimal (Decimal).

BoundAttributes.Name: TValue
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Specifies the type of the type parameter TValue for the Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxInputNumber<TValue> component.

BoundAttributes.Name: ParsingErrorMessage
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the error message used when displaying an a parsing error.
            Used with String.Format(...), {0} is replaced by Label property, {1} name of bounded property.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: InputMode
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
Hint to browsers as to the type of virtual keyboard configuration to use when editing.
If not set (neither with nor , i.e. null), the will be used for equal to 0. We cannot set for greater that 0 as the users with keyboard locale not matching the application locale won't be able to enter decimal point (is , in some locales and . in others).
Feel free to set the InputMode on your own as needed.

            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Decimals
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the number of decimal digits.
            Can be used only for floating point types, for integer types throws exception (for values other than 0).
            When not set, 2 decimal digits are used.

BoundAttributes.Name: InputMode
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
Hint to browsers as to the type of virtual keyboard configuration to use when editing.
If not set (neither with nor , i.e. null), the will be used for equal to 0. We cannot set for greater that 0 as the users with keyboard locale not matching the application locale won't be able to enter decimal point (is , in some locales and . in others).
Feel free to set the InputMode on your own as needed.

TagHelpers.Name: Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxMultiSelect<TValue, TItem>
TagHelpers.Documentation:
MultiSelect. Unlike a normal select, multiselect allows the user to select multiple options at once.
Full documentation and demos: https://havit.blazor.eu/components/HxMultiSelect Type of values. Type of items.

BoundAttributes.Name: TValue
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Specifies the type of the type parameter TValue for the Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxMultiSelect<TValue, TItem> component.

BoundAttributes.Name: TItem
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Specifies the type of the type parameter TItem for the Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxMultiSelect<TValue, TItem> component.

BoundAttributes.Name: Settings
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Set of settings to be applied to the component instance (overrides <see cref="P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxMultiSelect.Defaults" />, overridden by individual parameters).
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: InputSize
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Size of the input.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Data
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Items to display. 
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: TextSelector
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
Selects text to display from an item.
When not set, ToString() is used.

BoundAttributes.Name: ValueSelector
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
Selects value from an item.
Not required when TValue is the same as TItem.

BoundAttributes.Name: SortKeySelector
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
Selects value for item sorting. When not set, property will be used.
If you need complex sorting, pre-sort data manually or create a custom comparable property.

BoundAttributes.Name: AutoSort
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
When set to false, items will no longer be sorted.
Default value is true.

BoundAttributes.Name: EmptyText
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Text to display when the selection is empty (the <c>Value</c> property is <c>null</c> or empty).
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: NullDataText
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Text to display when <see cref="P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxMultiSelect`2.Data" /> is <c>null</c>.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: InputGroupStartText
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Input-group at the beginning of the input.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: InputGroupStartTemplate
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Input-group at the beginning of the input.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: InputGroupEndText
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Input-group at the end of the input.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: InputText
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Text to display in the input (default is a list of selected values).
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: InputTextSelector
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Function to build the text to be displayed in the input from selected items (default is a list of selected values).
            </summary>
            <remarks>Currently does not affect the chip being generated. Override <c>RenderChipValue()</c> method to influence the chip.</remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: InputGroupEndTemplate
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Input-group at the end of the input.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: AllowFiltering
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Enables filtering capabilities.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: FilterPredicate
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Defines a custom filtering predicate to apply to the list of items.
            If not specified, the default behavior filters items based on whether the item text (obtained via TextSelector) contains the filter query string.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ClearFilterOnHide
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            When enabled the filter will be cleared when the dropdown is closed.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: FilterEmptyResultTemplate
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Template that defines what should be rendered in case of empty items.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: FilterEmptyResultText
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Text to display when the filtered results list is empty and when not using <see cref="P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxMultiSelect`2.FilterEmptyResultTemplate" />.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: AllowSelectAll
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Enables select all capabilities.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: SelectAllText
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Text to display for the select all dropdown option.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: FilterSearchIcon
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Icon displayed in filter input for searching the filter.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: FilterClearIcon
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Icon displayed in filter input for clearing the filter.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ValidationMessageMode
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
Specifies how the validation message should be displayed.
The default is , you can override the application-wide default for all inputs in .

BoundAttributes.Name: Label
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The label text.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: LabelTemplate
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The label content.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Hint
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The hint to render after the input as form-text.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: HintTemplate
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The hint to render after the input as form-text.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: CssClass
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The custom CSS class to render with the wrapping div.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: LabelCssClass
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The custom CSS class to render with the label.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: InputCssClass
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The custom CSS class to render with the input element.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: GenerateChip
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            When <c>true</c>, <see cref="T:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxChipGenerator" /> is used to generate chip item(s). The default is <c>true</c>.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ChipTemplate
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The chip template.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Enabled
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            When <c>null</c> (default), the <c>Enabled</c> value is received from the cascading <see cref="P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxInputBase`1.FormState" />.
            When the value is <c>false</c>, the input is rendered as disabled.
            To set multiple controls as disabled, use <seealso cref="T:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.HxFormState" />.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: AdditionalAttributes
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets a collection of additional attributes that will be applied to the created element.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Value
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the value of the input. This should be used with two-way binding.
            </summary>
            <example>
            @bind-Value="model.PropertyName"
            </example>

BoundAttributes.Name: ValueChanged
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets a callback that updates the bound value.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ValueExpression
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets an expression that identifies the bound value.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: DisplayName
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the display name for this field.
            <para>This value is used when generating error messages when the input value fails to parse correctly.</para>
            </summary>

TagHelpers.Name: Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxMultiSelect<TValue, TItem>
TagHelpers.Documentation:
MultiSelect. Unlike a normal select, multiselect allows the user to select multiple options at once.
Full documentation and demos: https://havit.blazor.eu/components/HxMultiSelect Type of values. Type of items.

BoundAttributes.Name: TValue
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Specifies the type of the type parameter TValue for the Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxMultiSelect<TValue, TItem> component.

BoundAttributes.Name: TItem
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Specifies the type of the type parameter TItem for the Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxMultiSelect<TValue, TItem> component.

BoundAttributes.Name: Settings
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Set of settings to be applied to the component instance (overrides <see cref="P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxMultiSelect.Defaults" />, overridden by individual parameters).
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: InputSize
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Size of the input.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Data
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Items to display. 
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: TextSelector
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
Selects text to display from an item.
When not set, ToString() is used.

BoundAttributes.Name: ValueSelector
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
Selects value from an item.
Not required when TValue is the same as TItem.

BoundAttributes.Name: SortKeySelector
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
Selects value for item sorting. When not set, property will be used.
If you need complex sorting, pre-sort data manually or create a custom comparable property.

BoundAttributes.Name: AutoSort
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
When set to false, items will no longer be sorted.
Default value is true.

BoundAttributes.Name: EmptyText
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Text to display when the selection is empty (the <c>Value</c> property is <c>null</c> or empty).
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: NullDataText
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Text to display when <see cref="P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxMultiSelect`2.Data" /> is <c>null</c>.
            </summary>

TagHelpers.Name: Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxRadioButtonList<TValue, TItem>
TagHelpers.Documentation:
Data-based list of radio buttons. Consider creating a custom picker derived from .
Full documentation and demos: https://havit.blazor.eu/components/HxRadioButtonList Type of value. Type of items.

BoundAttributes.Name: TValue
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Specifies the type of the type parameter TValue for the Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxRadioButtonList<TValue, TItem> component.

BoundAttributes.Name: TItem
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Specifies the type of the type parameter TItem for the Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxRadioButtonList<TValue, TItem> component.

BoundAttributes.Name: ItemValueSelector
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Selects the value from the item.
            Not required when <c>TValue</c> is the same as <c>TItem</c>.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Data
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Items to display. 
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ItemTextSelector
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Selects the text to display from the item. Also used for chip text.
            When not set, <c>ToString()</c> is used.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ItemTemplate
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets the HTML to display from the item.
            When not set, <see cref="P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxRadioButtonList`2.ItemTextSelector" /> is used.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ItemSortKeySelector
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Selects the value to sort items. Uses the <see cref="P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxRadioButtonList`2.ItemTextSelector" /> property when not set.
            When complex sorting is required, sort the data manually and don't let this component sort them. Alternatively, create a custom comparable property.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Additional CSS class(es) for underlying radio-buttons (wrapping <c>div</c> element).
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Documentation:

            </summary>

            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ItemInputCssClassSelector

<summary>

            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ItemTextCssClass

<summary>
            Additional CSS class(es) for the text of the underlying radio-buttons.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ItemTextCssClassSelector
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Additional CSS class(es) for the text of the underlying radio-buttons.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: AutoSort
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            When <c>true</c>, items are sorted before displaying in the select.
            The default value is <c>true</c>.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Inline
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Allows grouping radios on the same horizontal row by rendering them inline. Default is <c>false</c>.
            </summary>

<summary>
            Set of settings to be applied to the component instance (overrides <see cref="P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxInputDate.Defaults" />, overridden by individual parameters).

BoundAttributes.Name: SortKeySelector
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>

            When complex sorting is required, sort the data manually and don't let this component sort them. Alternatively, create a custom comparable property.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Delay
BoundAttributes.Documentation:

Default is true.
