TagHelpers.Name: Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxGrid<TItem>
TagHelpers.Documentation:
Grid to display tabular data from data source. Includes support for client-side and server-side paging & sorting (or virtualized scrolling as needed).
Full documentation and demos: https://havit.blazor.eu/components/HxGrid Type of row data item.

BoundAttributes.Name: TItem
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Specifies the type of the type parameter TItem for the Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxGrid<TItem> component.

BoundAttributes.Name: Settings
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Specifies the grid settings. Overrides default settings in <see cref="P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxGrid.Defaults" /> and can be further overridden by individual parameters.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: DataProvider
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Data provider delegate for the grid. The data provider is responsible for fetching items to be rendered in the grid.
            It must always return an instance of <see cref="T:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.GridDataProviderResult`1" /> and cannot return null.
            </summary>
            <remarks>
            The delegate is invoked to fetch data based on the current grid state, including pagination and sorting parameters.
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: SelectionEnabled
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Enables or disables single item selection by row click. Can be used alongside multi-selection.
            Defaults to <c>true</c>.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: MultiSelectionEnabled
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Enables or disables multi-item selection using checkboxes in the first column.
            Can be used with single selection.
            Defaults to <c>false</c>.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Columns
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Grid columns.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: LoadingDataTemplate
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Defines a template for the initial data loading phase.
            This template is not used when loading data for sorting or paging operations.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: EmptyDataTemplate
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Template for rendering when the data source is empty but not null.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: LoadMoreTemplate
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Template for the "load more" button (or other UI element).
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: SelectedDataItem
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Represents the currently selected data item in the grid for data binding and state synchronization. Changes trigger <see cref="P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxGrid`1.SelectedDataItemChanged" />.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: SelectedDataItemChanged
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Event that fires when the <see cref="P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxGrid`1.SelectedDataItem" /> property changes. This event is intended for data binding and state synchronization.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: SelectedDataItems
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Represents the collection of currently selected data items in the grid, primarily for data binding and state management in multi-selection scenarios.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: SelectedDataItemsChanged
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Event that fires when the collection of selected data items changes. This is particularly relevant in multi-selection scenarios. It is intended for data binding and state synchronization.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ContentNavigationMode
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The strategy for how data items are displayed and loaded into the grid. Supported modes include pagination, load more, and infinite scroll.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: PageSize
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The number of items to display per page. Applicable for grid modes such as pagination and load more. Set to 0 to disable paging.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ShowFooterWhenEmptyData
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Determines whether the grid footer is rendered when the grid's data source is empty. The default value is <c>false</c>.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: PagerSettings
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Pager settings.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: LoadMoreButtonText
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The text for the "Load more" button, used in the <see cref="F:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.GridContentNavigationMode.LoadMore" /> navigation mode. The default text is obtained from localization resources.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: LoadMoreButtonSettings
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Configuration for the "Load more" button, including appearance and behavior settings. Relevant in grid modes that use a "Load more" button for data navigation.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: CurrentUserState
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the current state of the grid, including pagination and sorting information. This state can be used to restore the grid to a specific configuration or to synchronize it with external state management systems.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: CurrentUserStateChanged
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Event that fires when the <see cref="P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxGrid`1.CurrentUserState" /> property changes. This event can be used to react to changes in the grid's state, such as sorting or pagination adjustments.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: InProgress
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets a value indicating whether the grid is currently processing data, such as loading or refreshing items.
            When set to <c>null</c>, the progress state is automatically managed based on the data provider's activity.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: TableContainerCssClass
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Custom CSS class for the <c>div</c> element that wraps the main <c>table</c> element. Excludes the <see cref="T:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxPager" /> which is not wrapped in this <c>div</c> element.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: TableCssClass
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Custom CSS class for the main <c>table</c> element of the grid. This class allows for styling and customization of the grid's appearance.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: HeaderRowCssClass
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Custom CSS class for the header <c>tr</c> element in the grid. Enables specific styling for the header row separate from the rest of the grid.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ItemRowCssClass
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Custom CSS class for the data <c>tr</c> elements in the grid. This class is applied to each row of data, providing a way to customize the styling of data rows.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ItemRowHeight
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Height of each item row, used primarily in calculations for infinite scrolling.
            The default value (41px) corresponds to the typical row height in the Bootstrap 5 default theme.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ItemRowCssClassSelector
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Function that defines a custom CSS class for each data <c>tr</c> element based on the item it represents.
            This allows for conditional styling of rows based on their data.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ItemKeySelector
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
             Optionally defines a value for @key on each rendered row. Typically this should be used to specify a
             unique identifier, such as a primary key value, for each data item.
            
             This allows the grid to preserve the association between row elements and data items based on their
             unique identifiers, even when the TGridItem instances are replaced by new copies (for
             example, after a new query against the underlying data store).
            
             If not set, the @key will be the TItem instance itself.
             </summary>
             <remarks>Inspired by QuickGrid</remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: FooterRowCssClass
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            A custom CSS class for the footer <c>tr</c> element in the grid. This allows styling of the grid footer independently of other grid elements.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: PlaceholdersRowCount
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The number of placeholder rows to be rendered in the grid. Placeholders are used when loading data or when <see cref="P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxGrid`1.LoadingDataTemplate" />
            is not set. Set to 0 to disable placeholders. Default value is 5.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: OverscanCount
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Defines the number of additional items to be rendered before and after the visible region in an infinite scrolling scenario.
            This helps to reduce the frequency of rendering during scrolling, though higher values increase the number of elements present in the page.
            Default is 3.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Responsive
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Determines if the grid should be scrollable horizontally across different breakpoints.
            When set to true, the <c>table-responsive</c> class is added to the table.
            Default is false.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Hover
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Enables or disables the hover state on table rows within a <c><tbody></c>.
            When not set, the table is hoverable by default if selection is enabled. This property customizes the hover behavior of the grid rows.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Striped
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Adds zebra-striping to any table row within the <c><tbody></c> for better readability.
            Rows will have alternating background colors.
            Default is false.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: SortAscendingIcon
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Icon to indicate the ascending sort direction in the column header. This icon is displayed when a column is sorted in ascending order.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: SortDescendingIcon
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Icon to indicate the descending sort direction in the column header. This icon is shown when a column is sorted in descending order.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Context
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Specifies the parameter name for all child content expressions.

TagHelpers.Name: Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxGrid<TItem>
TagHelpers.Documentation:
Grid to display tabular data from data source. Includes support for client-side and server-side paging & sorting (or virtualized scrolling as needed).
Full documentation and demos: https://havit.blazor.eu/components/HxGrid Type of row data item.

BoundAttributes.Name: TItem
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Specifies the type of the type parameter TItem for the Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxGrid<TItem> component.

BoundAttributes.Name: Settings
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Specifies the grid settings. Overrides default settings in <see cref="P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxGrid.Defaults" /> and can be further overridden by individual parameters.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: DataProvider
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Data provider delegate for the grid. The data provider is responsible for fetching items to be rendered in the grid.
            It must always return an instance of <see cref="T:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.GridDataProviderResult`1" /> and cannot return null.
            </summary>
            <remarks>
            The delegate is invoked to fetch data based on the current grid state, including pagination and sorting parameters.
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: SelectionEnabled
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Enables or disables single item selection by row click. Can be used alongside multi-selection.
            Defaults to <c>true</c>.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: MultiSelectionEnabled
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Enables or disables multi-item selection using checkboxes in the first column.
            Can be used with single selection.
            Defaults to <c>false</c>.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Columns
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Grid columns.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: LoadingDataTemplate
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Defines a template for the initial data loading phase.
            This template is not used when loading data for sorting or paging operations.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: EmptyDataTemplate
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Template for rendering when the data source is empty but not null.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: LoadMoreTemplate
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Template for the "load more" button (or other UI element).
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: SelectedDataItem
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Represents the currently selected data item in the grid for data binding and state synchronization. Changes trigger <see cref="P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxGrid`1.SelectedDataItemChanged" />.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: SelectedDataItemChanged
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Event that fires when the <see cref="P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxGrid`1.SelectedDataItem" /> property changes. This event is intended for data binding and state synchronization.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: SelectedDataItems
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Represents the collection of currently selected data items in the grid, primarily for data binding and state management in multi-selection scenarios.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: SelectedDataItemsChanged
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Event that fires when the collection of selected data items changes. This is particularly relevant in multi-selection scenarios. It is intended for data binding and state synchronization.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ContentNavigationMode
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The strategy for how data items are displayed and loaded into the grid. Supported modes include pagination, load more, and infinite scroll.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: PageSize
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The number of items to display per page. Applicable for grid modes such as pagination and load more. Set to 0 to disable paging.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ShowFooterWhenEmptyData
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Determines whether the grid footer is rendered when the grid's data source is empty. The default value is <c>false</c>.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: PagerSettings
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Pager settings.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: LoadMoreButtonText
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The text for the "Load more" button, used in the <see cref="F:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.GridContentNavigationMode.LoadMore" /> navigation mode. The default text is obtained from localization resources.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Documentation:

            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Documentation:

TagHelpers.Name: Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxGridColumn<TItem>
TagHelpers.Documentation:
<summary>
            Grid column.
            </summary>
            <typeparam name="TItem">Grid row data type.</typeparam>

BoundAttributes.Name: TItem
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Specifies the type of the type parameter TItem for the Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxGridColumn<TItem> component.

BoundAttributes.Name: Id
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Column unique identifier.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Visible
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Indicates whether the column is visible (otherwise the column is hidden).
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Order
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The order (display index) of the column.
            Columns are displayed in the order of this property.
            Columns with the same value are displayed in the order of appearance in the code (when the columns are not conditionally displayed using @if).
            </summary>
            <exception cref="T:System.ArgumentException">Value is <c>Int32.MinValue</c> or <c>Int32.MaxValue</c>.</exception>

BoundAttributes.Name: HeaderText
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Header cell text.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: HeaderTemplate
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Header cell template.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: HeaderCssClass
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Header cell CSS class.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ItemTextSelector
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Returns text for the item.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ItemTemplate
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Returns template for the item.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ItemCssClass
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Returns item CSS class (not dependent on data).
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ItemCssClassSelector
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Returns item CSS class for the specific date item.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: PlaceholderTemplate
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Placeholder cell template.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: FooterText
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Footer cell text.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: FooterTemplate
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Footer cell template.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: FooterCssClass
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Footer cell CSS class.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: SortString
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Returns column sorting as a string.
            Used to set sorting as a string, i.e., to get value to pass to the backend.
            Ignored for client-side sorting.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: SortKeySelector
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Returns column sorting expression for automatic grid sorting.
            To be used for "strongly typed" setting of sorting, required for client-side sorting.
            Must be <see cref="T:System.IComparable" />.
            Sorting of the column does not support multiple expressions. Create an artificial property and implement <see cref="T:System.IComparable" />.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: SortDirection
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Initial sorting direction. Default is <see cref="F:Havit.Collections.SortDirection.Ascending" />.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: IsDefaultSortColumn
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Indicates that the sorting on the column is default (primary) on the grid.
            Set <c>true</c> for the column which is to be used for default sorting.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Context
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Specifies the parameter name for all child content expressions.

TagHelpers.Name: Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxListLayout<TFilterModel>
TagHelpers.Documentation:
Provides a unified layout for data presentation components and associated filtering controls.
This component orchestrates the interaction between filter controls and the data presentation component. The data list is typically implemented using a component. Filters are displayed in a component, while filter values are shown as . Additionally, it supports predefined named views for quick switching between different filter configurations and other features such as a title, search box, and commands. Full documentation and demos: https://havit.blazor.eu/components/HxListLayout

BoundAttributes.Name: TFilterModel
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Specifies the type of the type parameter TFilterModel for the Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxListLayout<TFilterModel> component.

BoundAttributes.Name: Settings
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Set of settings to be applied to the component instance (overrides <see cref="P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxListLayout.Defaults" />, overridden by individual parameters).
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Title
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Title of the component.
            If <see cref="P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxListLayout`1.TitleFromNamedView" /> is <c>true</c> and <see cref="P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxListLayout`1.SelectedNamedView" /> is not <c>null</c>, the component's title displays the name of the currently selected Named View.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: TitleTemplate
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Title of the component (in form of RenderFragment).
            If <see cref="P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxListLayout`1.TitleFromNamedView" /> is <c>true</c> and <see cref="P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxListLayout`1.SelectedNamedView" /> is not <c>null</c>, the component's title displays the name of the currently selected Named View.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: NamedViews
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Represents the collection of Named Views available for selection. 
            Each Named View defines a pre-set filter configuration that can be applied to the data.
            </summary>
            <remarks>
            Named Views provide a convenient way for users to quickly apply commonly used filters to the data set.
            Ensure that each Named View in the collection has a unique name which accurately describes its filter criteria.
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: SelectedNamedView
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Selected named view (highlighted in the list with <c>.active</c> CSS class).
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: TitleFromNamedView
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Indicates whether the name of the selected Named View (<see cref="P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxListLayout`1.SelectedNamedView" />) is automatically used as title.
            If <c>true</c>, the component's title changes to match the name of the currently selected Named View.
            Useful for dynamic title updates based on user selections from predefined views.
            The default value is <c>true</c>.
            </summary>
            <remarks>
            This update occurs upon the selection of a new Named View. It allows the Title to reflect the
            current data filtering context provided by the Named Views, enhancing user understanding of the active filter.
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: CardSettings
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Settings for the wrapping <see cref="T:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxCard" />.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: FilterOpenButtonSettings
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Settings for the <see cref="T:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxButton" /> opening the filtering offcanvas.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: FilterSubmitButtonSettings
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Settings for the <see cref="T:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxButton" /> submitting the filter.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: FilterOffcanvasSettings
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Settings for the <see cref="T:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxOffcanvas" /> with the filter.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: CssClass
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Additional CSS classes for the wrapping <c>div</c>.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Context
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Specifies the parameter name for all child content expressions.

TagHelpers.Name: Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxListGroup
TagHelpers.Documentation:
Bootstrap 5 List group component.
List groups are a flexible and powerful component for displaying a series of content.
Full documentation and demos: https://havit.blazor.eu/components/HxListGroup

BoundAttributes.Name: ChildContent
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Content of the list group component.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Flush
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            If set to <c>true</c>, removes borders and rounded corners to render list group items edge-to-edge.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Numbered
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Set to <c>true</c> to opt into numbered list group items. The list group changes from an unordered list to an ordered list.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Horizontal
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Changes the layout of the list group items from vertical to horizontal. Cannot be combined with <see cref="P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxListGroup.Flush" />.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: CssClass
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>

            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: AdditionalAttributes
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Additional attributes to be splatted onto an underlying <see cref="T:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxListGroup" /> component.
            </summary>

TagHelpers.Name: Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxModal
TagHelpers.Documentation:
<summary>
            Component for rendering a modal dialog as a Bootstrap Modal.
            Visit <see href="https://getbootstrap.com/docs/5.3/components/modal/">Bootstrap Modal</see> for more information.
            Full documentation and demos available at <see href="https://havit.blazor.eu/components/HxModal">https://havit.blazor.eu/components/HxModal</see>
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Settings
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            A set of settings applied to this component instance. Overrides <see cref="P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxModal.Defaults" /> and is itself overridden by individual parameters.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Animated
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Determines whether modals appear without fading in. Setting to <c>false</c> removes the <c>.fade</c> class from the modal markup.
            Default value is <c>true</c>.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Title
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Title in modal header.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: HeaderTemplate
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Header template.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: BodyTemplate
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Body template.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: FooterTemplate
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Footer template.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Size
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Size of the modal. Default is <see cref="F:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.ModalSize.Regular" />.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Fullscreen
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Fullscreen behavior of the modal. Default is <see cref="F:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.ModalFullscreen.Disabled" />.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ShowCloseButton
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Indicates whether the modal shows close button in header.
            Default value is <c>true</c>.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: CloseButtonIcon
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Close icon to be used in header.
            If set to <c>null</c>, Bootstrap default close-button will be used.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: CloseOnEscape
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Indicates whether the modal closes when escape key is pressed.
            Default value is <c>true</c>.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Backdrop
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Indicates whether to apply a backdrop on body while the modal is open.
            If set to <see cref="F:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.ModalBackdrop.Static" />, the modal cannot be closed by clicking on the backdrop.
            Default value (from <see cref="P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxModal.Defaults" />) is <see cref="F:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.ModalBackdrop.True" />.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Scrollable
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Allows scrolling the modal body. Default is <c>false</c>.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Centered
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
Allows vertical centering of the modal.
Default is false (horizontal only).

BoundAttributes.Name: CssClass
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Additional CSS class for the main element (<c>div.modal</c>).
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: DialogCssClass
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Additional CSS class for the dialog (<c>div.modal-dialog</c> element).
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: HeaderCssClass
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Additional header CSS class (<c>div.modal-header</c>).
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: BodyCssClass
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Additional body CSS class (<c>div.modal-body</c>).
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ContentCssClass
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Additional content CSS class (<c>div.modal-content</c>).
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: FooterCssClass
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Additional footer CSS class (<c>div.modal-footer</c>).
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: OnHiding
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Fired immediately when the 'hide' instance method is called. This can be triggered by , the close button, the Esc key, or other interactions. To cancel hiding, set to true. There is intentionally no virtual InvokeOnHidingAsync() method to override to avoid confusion. The hide.bs.modal event is only subscribed to when the callback is set.

BoundAttributes.Name: OnClosed
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Fired when the modal has finished hiding from the user, after CSS transitions complete.
            Triggered by <see cref="M:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxModal.HideAsync" />, the close button, the <kbd>Esc</kbd> key, or other interactions.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: OnShown
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Fired when a modal element becomes visible to the user, after CSS transitions complete.
            </summary>

The breakpoint below which the sidebar switches to the mobile version (exclusive).

TagHelpers.Name: Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxOffcanvas
TagHelpers.Documentation:
Bootstrap Offcanvas component (aka Drawer).
Full documentation and demos: https://havit.blazor.eu/components/HxOffcanvas

BoundAttributes.Name: Settings
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Set of settings to be applied to the component instance (overrides <see cref="P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxOffcanvas.Defaults" />, overridden by individual parameters).
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Title
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Text for the title in the header.
            (Is rendered into <c><h5 class="offcanvas-title"></c> - in contrast to <see cref="P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxOffcanvas.HeaderTemplate" /> which is rendered directly into <c>offcanvas-header</c>).
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: HeaderTemplate
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Content for the header.
            (Is rendered directly into <c>offcanvas-header</c> - in contrast to <see cref="P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxOffcanvas.Title" /> which is rendered into <c><h5 class="offcanvas-title"></c>).
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: BodyTemplate
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Body content.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: FooterTemplate
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Footer content.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Placement
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Placement of the offcanvas. The default is <see cref="F:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.OffcanvasPlacement.End" /> (right).
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ResponsiveBreakpoint
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Breakpoint below which the contents are rendered outside the viewport in an offcanvas (above this breakpoint, the offcanvas body is rendered inside the viewport).
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: RenderMode
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
Determines whether the content is always rendered or only if the offcanvas is open.
The default is .
Please note, this setting applies only when is set. For all other values, the content is always rendered (to be available for the mobile version).

BoundAttributes.Name: Size
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Size of the offcanvas. The default is <see cref="F:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.OffcanvasSize.Regular" />.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ShowCloseButton
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Indicates whether the modal shows a close button in the header.
            The default value is <c>true</c>.
            Use <see cref="P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxOffcanvas.CloseButtonIcon" /> to change the shape of the button.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: CloseOnEscape
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Indicates whether the offcanvas closes when the escape key is pressed.
            The default value is <c>true</c>.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: CloseButtonIcon
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The close icon to be used in the header.
            If set to <c>null</c>, the Bootstrap default close button will be used.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Backdrop
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Indicates whether to apply a backdrop on the body while the offcanvas is open.
            If set to <see cref="F:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.OffcanvasBackdrop.Static" />, the offcanvas cannot be closed by clicking on the backdrop.
            The default value (from <see cref="P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxOffcanvas.Defaults" />) is <see cref="F:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.OffcanvasBackdrop.True" />.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ScrollingEnabled
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Indicates whether body (page) scrolling is allowed while the offcanvas is open.
            The default value (from <see cref="P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxOffcanvas.Defaults" />) is <c>false</c>.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: CssClass
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Offcanvas additional CSS class. Added to root <c>div</c> (<c>.offcanvas</c>).
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: HeaderCssClass
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Additional header CSS class.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: BodyCssClass
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Additional body CSS class.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: FooterCssClass
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Additional footer CSS class.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: OnClosed
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            This event is fired when an offcanvas element has been hidden from the user (will wait for CSS transitions to complete).
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: OnShown
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            This event is fired when an offcanvas element has been made visible to the user (will wait for CSS transitions to complete).
            </summary>

TagHelpers.Name: Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxPlaceholderButton
TagHelpers.Documentation:
Bootstrap 5 placeholder in the form of a button.
Derives from (adds the placeholder class and changes the default value of Enabled to false).
Set the size of the button by using the parameter.

BoundAttributes.Name: Columns
BoundAttributes.Documentation: <inheritdoc cref="P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.ILayoutColumnComponent.Columns" />

BoundAttributes.Name: ColumnsSmallUp
BoundAttributes.Documentation: <inheritdoc cref="P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.ILayoutColumnComponent.ColumnsSmallUp" />

BoundAttributes.Name: ColumnsMediumUp
BoundAttributes.Documentation: <inheritdoc cref="P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.ILayoutColumnComponent.ColumnsMediumUp" />

BoundAttributes.Name: ColumnsLargeUp
BoundAttributes.Documentation: <inheritdoc cref="P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.ILayoutColumnComponent.ColumnsLargeUp" />

BoundAttributes.Name: ColumnsExtraLargeUp
BoundAttributes.Documentation: <inheritdoc cref="P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.ILayoutColumnComponent.ColumnsExtraLargeUp" />

BoundAttributes.Name: ColumnsXxlUp
BoundAttributes.Documentation: <inheritdoc cref="P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.ILayoutColumnComponent.ColumnsXxlUp" />

BoundAttributes.Name: Settings
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Set of settings to be applied to the component instance (overrides <see cref="P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxButton.Defaults" />, overridden by individual parameters).
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Text
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Text of the button.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ChildContent
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Button content.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Icon
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Icon to render into the button.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: IconPlacement
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Position of the icon within the button. The default is <see cref="F:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.ButtonIconPlacement.Start" /> (configurable through <see cref="P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxButton.Defaults" />).
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Color
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
Bootstrap button style - theme color.
The default is taken from ( if not customized).

BoundAttributes.Name: Size
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Button size. The default is <see cref="F:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.ButtonSize.Regular" />.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Outline
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            <see href="https://getbootstrap.com/docs/5.3/components/buttons/#outline-buttons">Bootstrap "outline" button</see> style.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: CssClass
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
Custom CSS class to render with the <button />.
When using you might want to use instead of to get the desired result.

BoundAttributes.Name: IconCssClass
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            CSS class to be rendered with the button icon.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Enabled
BoundAttributes.Documentation: <inheritdoc cref="P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Infrastructure.ICascadeEnabledComponent.Enabled" />

BoundAttributes.Name: EditContext
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Associated <see cref="P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxButton.EditContext" />.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: FormId
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Specifies the form the button belongs to.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Tooltip
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
Tooltip text.
If set, a span wrapper will be rendered around the <button />. For most scenarios, you will then use instead of .

BoundAttributes.Name: TooltipPlacement
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Tooltip placement.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: TooltipCssClass
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Custom CSS class to render with the tooltip.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: TooltipWrapperCssClass
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
Custom CSS class to render with the tooltip span wrapper of the <button />.
If set, the span wrapper will be rendered no matter whether the text is set or not.

BoundAttributes.Name: OnClick
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Raised after the button is clicked.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: OnValidClick
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Raised after the button is clicked and EditContext validation succeeds.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: OnInvalidClick
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Raised after the button is clicked and EditContext validation fails.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: OnClickStopPropagation
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Stops onClick-event propagation. Default is <c>true</c>.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: OnClickPreventDefault
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Prevents the default action for the onclick event. Default is <c>false</c>.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Spinner
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Sets the state of the embedded <see cref="T:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxSpinner" />.
            Leave <c>null</c> if you want automated spinner when any of the <see cref="P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxButton.OnClick" /> handlers is running.
            You can set an explicit <c>false</c> constant to disable (override) the spinner automation.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: SingleClickProtection
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Sets <c>false</c> if you want to allow multiple <see cref="P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxButton.OnClick" /> handlers in parallel. Default is <c>true</c>.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: AdditionalAttributes
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Additional attributes to be splatted onto an underlying <c><button></c> element.
            </summary>

TagHelpers.Name: Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxProgress
TagHelpers.Documentation:
Bootstrap 5 Progress component.
A wrapping component for the .
Full documentation and demos: https://havit.blazor.eu/components/HxProgress

BoundAttributes.Name: ChildContent
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Content consisting of one or multiple <c>HxProgressBar</c> components.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: CssClass
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Additional CSS classes for the progress.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Height
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Height of all inner progress bars. The default value is <c>15px</c>.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: MinValue
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Lowest possible value. The default value is <c>0</c>.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: MaxValue
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Highest possible value. The default value is <c>100</c>.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Striped
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            If <c>true</c>, applies a stripe via CSS gradient over the background color of the progress bar.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Animated
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            If <c>true</c>, the stripes are animated right to left using CSS3 animations. The stripes are automatically switched on.
            </summary>

The order (display index) of the tab.
Due to stable sorting used, the order in which the tabs are rendered is preserved when the parameter is not set.

<summary>
            <c>True</c> for visible tab. Set <c>false</c> when tab should not be visible.

BoundAttributes.Documentation:

            When value is <c>false</c>, input is rendered as disabled.
            To set multiple controls as disabled use <seealso cref="T:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.HxFormState" />.

TagHelpers.Name: Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxTabPanel
TagHelpers.Documentation:
Container for s for easier implementation of tabbed UI.
Encapsulates ( variant as default) and s so you don't have to bother with them explicitly.
Full documentation and demos: https://havit.blazor.eu/components/HxTabPanel

BoundAttributes.Name: NavVariant
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The visual variant of the nav items.
            Default is <see cref="F:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.NavVariant.Tabs" />.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Variant
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Set to <see cref="F:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.TabPanelVariant.Card" /> if you want to wrap the tab panel in a card with the tab navigation in the header.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: RenderMode
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
Determines whether the content of all tabs is always rendered or only if the tab is active.
Default is .

BoundAttributes.Name: CardSettings
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Card settings for the wrapping card.
            Applies only if <see cref="P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxTabPanel.Variant" /> is set to <see cref="F:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.TabPanelVariant.Card" />.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ActiveTabId
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            ID of the active tab (@bindable).
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ActiveTabIdChanged
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Raised when the ID of the active tab changes.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: InitialActiveTabId
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            ID of the tab which should be active at the very beginning.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ChildContent
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Tabs.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: CssClass
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Additional CSS class.
            </summary>

TagHelpers.Name: Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxInputTags
TagHelpers.Documentation:
Input for entering tags. Does not allow duplicate tags.
Full documentation and demos: https://havit.blazor.eu/components/HxInputTags

BoundAttributes.Name: Settings
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Set of settings to be applied to the component instance (overrides <see cref="P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxInputTags.Defaults" />, overridden by individual parameters).
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: AllowCustomTags
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Indicates whether you are restricted to suggested items only (<c>false</c>).
            Default is <c>true</c> (you can type your own tags).
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: DataProvider
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Set to a method providing data for tag suggestions.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: SuggestMinimumLength
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The minimum number of characters to start suggesting. The default is <c>2</c>.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: SuggestDelay
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The debounce delay in milliseconds. The default is <c>300 ms</c>.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Delimiters
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Characters that divide the current input into separate tags when typed. The default is comma, semicolon, and space.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ShowAddButton
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Indicates whether the add icon (+) should be displayed. The default is <c>false</c>.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: AddButtonText
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The optional text for the add button. Displayed only when there are no tags (the <c>Value</c> is empty). The default is <c>null</c> (none).
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Naked
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Indicates whether a "naked" variant should be displayed (no border). The default is <c>false</c>. Consider enabling <see cref="P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxInputTags.ShowAddButton" /> when using <c>Naked</c>.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Placeholder
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            A short hint displayed in the input field before the user enters a value.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: TagBadgeSettings
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The settings for the <see cref="T:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxBadge" /> used to render tags. The default is <c>Color="<see cref="F:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.ThemeColor.Light" />"</c> and <c>TextColor="<see cref="F:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.ThemeColor.Dark" />"</c>.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: LabelType
BoundAttributes.Documentation: <inheritdoc cref="T:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxInputBase`1" />

BoundAttributes.Name: InputSize
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The size of the input.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: InputGroupCssClass
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The custom CSS class to render with the input-group span.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: InputGroupStartText
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The input-group at the beginning of the input.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: InputGroupStartTemplate
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The input-group at the beginning of the input.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: InputGroupEndText
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The input-group at the end of the input.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: InputGroupEndTemplate
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The input-group at the end of the input.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ValidationMessageMode
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
Specifies how the validation message should be displayed.
The default is , you can override the application-wide default for all inputs in .

BoundAttributes.Name: Label
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The label text.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: LabelTemplate
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The label content.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Hint
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The hint to render after the input as form-text.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: HintTemplate
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The hint to render after the input as form-text.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: CssClass
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The custom CSS class to render with the wrapping div.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: LabelCssClass
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The custom CSS class to render with the label.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: InputCssClass
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The custom CSS class to render with the input element.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: GenerateChip
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            When <c>true</c>, <see cref="T:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxChipGenerator" /> is used to generate chip item(s). The default is <c>true</c>.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ChipTemplate
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The chip template.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Enabled
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            When <c>null</c> (default), the <c>Enabled</c> value is received from the cascading <see cref="P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxInputBase`1.FormState" />.
            When the value is <c>false</c>, the input is rendered as disabled.
            To set multiple controls as disabled, use <seealso cref="T:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.HxFormState" />.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: AdditionalAttributes
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets a collection of additional attributes that will be applied to the created element.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Value
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the value of the input. This should be used with two-way binding.
            </summary>
            <example>
            @bind-Value="model.PropertyName"
            </example>

BoundAttributes.Name: ValueChanged
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets a callback that updates the bound value.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ValueExpression
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets an expression that identifies the bound value.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: DisplayName
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the display name for this field.
            <para>This value is used when generating error messages when the input value fails to parse correctly.</para>
            </summary>

            To set multiple controls as disabled, use <seealso cref="T:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.HxFormState" />.
            </summary>

TagHelpers.Name: Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxPopover
TagHelpers.Documentation:
Bootstrap Popover component.
Rendered as a span wrapper to fully support popovers on disabled elements (see example in Disabled elements in the Bootstrap popover documentation).
Full documentation and demos: https://havit.blazor.eu/components/HxPopover

BoundAttributes.Name: Settings
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Set of settings to be applied to the component instance (overrides <see cref="P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxPopover.Defaults" />, overridden by individual parameters).
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Title
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Popover title.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Content
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Popover content.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Placement
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Popover placement. The default is <see cref="F:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.PopoverPlacement.Right" />.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Trigger
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Popover trigger(s). The default is <see cref="F:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.PopoverTrigger.Click" />.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Html
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Allows you to insert HTML. If <c>false</c>, <c>innerText</c> property will be used to insert content into the DOM.
            Use text if you're worried about XSS attacks.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Container
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Appends the tooltip/popover to a specific element. Default is <c>body</c>.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Sanitize
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Enable or disable the sanitization. If activated HTML content will be sanitized. <see href="https://getbootstrap.com/docs/5.3/getting-started/javascript/#sanitizer">See the sanitizer section in Bootstrap JavaScript documentation</see>.
            Default is <c>true</c>.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Offset
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Offset of the component relative to its target (ChildContent).
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Animation
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
Apply a CSS fade transition to the tooltip (enable/disable).
Default is true.

BoundAttributes.Name: CssClass
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Custom CSS class to add.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: WrapperCssClass
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Custom CSS class to render with the <c>span</c> wrapper of the child-content.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ChildContent
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Child content to wrap.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: OnShown
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Fired when the content has been made visible to the user and CSS transitions have completed.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: OnHidden
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Fired when the content has finished being hidden from the user and CSS transitions have completed.
            </summary>

            Indicates whether you are restricted to suggested items only (<c>false</c>).
            Default is <c>true</c> (you can type your own tags).
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: SuggestMinimumLengthEffective
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Minimal number of characters to start suggesting. Default is <c>2</c>.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: DelimitersEffective
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Characters, when typed, divide the current input into separate tags.
            Default is comma, semicolon and space.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ShowAddButtonEffective
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Indicates whether the add-icon (+) should be displayed.
            Default is <c>false</c>.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: AddButtonText
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Optional text for the add-button.
            Displayed only when there are no tags (the <see cref="P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.Internal.HxInputTagsInternal.Value" /> is empty).
            Default is <c>null</c> (none).
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Naked
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Indicates whether a "naked" variant should be displayed (no border).
            Default is <c>false</c>.
            Consider enabling <see cref="P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.HxInputTags.ShowAddButton" /> when using <c>Naked</c>.

TagHelpers.Name: Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.HxInputFileCore
TagHelpers.Documentation:
<summary>
            Raw component extending <see cref="T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.Forms.InputFile" /> with direct upload.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Settings
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Set of settings to be applied to the component instance (overrides <see cref="P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.HxInputFileCore.Defaults" />, overridden by individual parameters).
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: UploadUrl
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            URL of the server endpoint receiving the files.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: OnProgress
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Raised during running file upload (the frequency depends on browser implementation).
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: OnFileUploaded
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Raised after a file is uploaded (for every single file separately).
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: OnUploadCompleted
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Raised when all files are uploaded (after all <see cref="P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.HxInputFileCore.OnFileUploaded" /> events).
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Multiple
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Single <c>false</c> or multiple <c>true</c> files upload.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Enabled
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Make the item appear disabled by setting to <c>false</c>.
            The default is <c>true</c>.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Accept
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Takes as its value a comma-separated list of one or more file types, or unique file type specifiers, describing which file types to allow.
            <see href="https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Attributes/accept">MDN Web Docs - HTML attribute: accept</see>.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: MaxFileSize
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The maximum file size in bytes.
            When exceeded, the <see cref="P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.HxInputFileCore.OnFileUploaded" /> returns <c>413-RequestEntityTooLarge</c> as <see cref="P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.FileUploadedEventArgs.ResponseStatus" />.
            The default is <c>long.MaxValue</c> (unlimited).
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: MaxParallelUploads
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The maximum number of concurrent uploads. The default is <c>6</c>.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Id
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The input element id.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: OnChange
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the event callback that will be invoked when the collection of selected files changes.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: AdditionalAttributes
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets a collection of additional attributes that will be applied to the input element.
            </summary>

TagHelpers.Name: Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.HxRedirectTo
TagHelpers.Documentation:
Rendering a HxRedirectTo will navigate to a new location.
Can be used in AuthorizeRouteView, Router and similar components to redirect to a login page, error page, or similar.
Full documentation and demos: https://havit.blazor.eu/components/HxRedirectTo

BoundAttributes.Name: Uri
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            URI to navigate to.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ForceLoad
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
If true, bypasses client-side routing and forces the browser to load the new page from the server, regardless of whether the URI would normally be handled by the client-side router.
Default is false.

TagHelpers.Name: Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.HxRedirectTo

TagHelpers.Name: Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.HxRepeater<TItem>
TagHelpers.Documentation:
A data-bound list component that allows custom layout by repeating a specified template for each item displayed in the list. Analogous to the ASP.NET WebForms Repeater control.
Full documentation and demos: https://havit.blazor.eu/components/HxRepeater The type of the item

BoundAttributes.Name: TItem
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Specifies the type of the type parameter TItem for the Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.HxRepeater<TItem> component.

BoundAttributes.Name: HeaderTemplate
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The template that defines how the header section of the Repeater component is displayed.
            Renders only if there are any items to display.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ItemTemplate
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The template that defines how items in the Repeater component are displayed.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: FooterTemplate
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The template that defines how the footer section of the Repeater component is displayed.
            Renders only if there are any items to display.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: NullTemplate
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The template that defines what should be rendered in case of Items being null.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: EmptyTemplate
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The template that defines what should be rendered in case of empty Items.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Data
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The items to be rendered.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Context
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Specifies the parameter name for all child content expressions.

TagHelpers.Name: Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.CascadingValue<TValue>
TagHelpers.Documentation:
<summary>
            A component that provides a cascading value to all descendant components.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: TValue
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Specifies the type of the type parameter TValue for the Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.CascadingValue<TValue> component.

BoundAttributes.Name: ChildContent
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The content to which the value should be provided.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Value
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The value to be provided.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Name
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
             Optionally gives a name to the provided value. Descendant components
             will be able to receive the value by specifying this name.

TagHelpers.Name: Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.Web.Virtualization.Virtualize<TItem>
TagHelpers.Documentation:
<summary>
            Provides functionality for rendering a virtualized list of items.
            </summary>
            <typeparam name="TItem">The <c>context</c> type for the items being rendered.</typeparam>

BoundAttributes.Name: TItem
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Specifies the type of the type parameter TItem for the Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.Web.Virtualization.Virtualize<TItem> component.

BoundAttributes.Name: ChildContent
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the item template for the list.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ItemContent
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the item template for the list.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Placeholder
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the template for items that have not yet been loaded in memory.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ItemSize
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets the size of each item in pixels. Defaults to 50px.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ItemsProvider
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the function providing items to the list.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Items
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the fixed item source.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: OverscanCount
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets a value that determines how many additional items will be rendered
            before and after the visible region. This help to reduce the frequency of rendering
            during scrolling. However, higher values mean that more elements will be present
            in the page.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: SpacerElement
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
             Gets or sets the tag name of the HTML element that will be used as the virtualization spacer.
             One such element will be rendered before the visible items, and one more after them, using
             an explicit "height" style to control the scroll range.
            
             The default value is "div". If you are placing the <see cref="T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.Web.Virtualization.Virtualize`1" /> instance inside
             an element that requires a specific child tag name, consider setting that here. For example when
             rendering inside a "tbody", consider setting <see cref="P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.Web.Virtualization.Virtualize`1.SpacerElement" /> to the value "tr".
             </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Context
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Specifies the parameter name for all child content expressions.

TagHelpers.Name: Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.TagHelpers.EnvironmentTagHelper
TagHelpers.Documentation:
<summary>
            <see cref="T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Razor.TagHelpers.ITagHelper" /> implementation targeting <environment> elements that conditionally renders
            content based on the current value of <see cref="P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Hosting.IHostingEnvironment.EnvironmentName" />.
            If the environment is not listed in the specified <see cref="P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.TagHelpers.EnvironmentTagHelper.Names" /> or <see cref="P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.TagHelpers.EnvironmentTagHelper.Include" />,
            or if it is in <see cref="P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.TagHelpers.EnvironmentTagHelper.Exclude" />, the content will not be rendered.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: names
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            A comma separated list of environment names in which the content should be rendered.
            If the current environment is also in the <see cref="P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.TagHelpers.EnvironmentTagHelper.Exclude" /> list, the content will not be rendered.
            </summary>
            <remarks>
            The specified environment names are compared case insensitively to the current value of
            <see cref="P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Hosting.IHostingEnvironment.EnvironmentName" />.
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: include
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            A comma separated list of environment names in which the content should be rendered.
            If the current environment is also in the <see cref="P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.TagHelpers.EnvironmentTagHelper.Exclude" /> list, the content will not be rendered.
            </summary>
            <remarks>
            The specified environment names are compared case insensitively to the current value of
            <see cref="P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Hosting.IHostingEnvironment.EnvironmentName" />.
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: exclude
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            A comma separated list of environment names in which the content will not be rendered.
            </summary>
            <remarks>
            The specified environment names are compared case insensitively to the current value of
            <see cref="P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Hosting.IHostingEnvironment.EnvironmentName" />.
            </remarks>

            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>

            </summary>
            <remarks>
            Passed through to the generated HTML in all cases.
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>

            </summary>
            <remarks>
            If <c>true</c> then a query string "v" with the encoded content of the file is added.
            </remarks>

TagHelpers.Name: Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.TagHelpers.InputTagHelper
TagHelpers.Documentation:
<summary>
            <see cref="T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Razor.TagHelpers.ITagHelper" /> implementation targeting <input> elements with an <c>asp-for</c> attribute.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: asp-for
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            An expression to be evaluated against the current model.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: asp-format
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The format string (see <see href="https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/txafckwd.aspx" />) used to format the
            <see cref="P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.TagHelpers.InputTagHelper.For" /> result. Sets the generated "value" attribute to that formatted string.
            </summary>
            <remarks>
            Not used if the provided (see <see cref="P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.TagHelpers.InputTagHelper.InputTypeName" />) or calculated "type" attribute value is
            <c>checkbox</c>, <c>password</c>, or <c>radio</c>. That is, <see cref="P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.TagHelpers.InputTagHelper.Format" /> is used when calling
            <see cref="M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.ViewFeatures.IHtmlGenerator.GenerateTextBox(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Rendering.ViewContext,Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.ViewFeatures.ModelExplorer,System.String,System.Object,System.String,System.Object)" />.
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: type
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The type of the <input> element.
            </summary>
            <remarks>
            Passed through to the generated HTML in all cases. Also used to determine the <see cref="T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.ViewFeatures.IHtmlGenerator" />
            helper to call and the default <see cref="P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.TagHelpers.InputTagHelper.Format" /> value. A default <see cref="P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.TagHelpers.InputTagHelper.Format" /> is not calculated
            if the provided (see <see cref="P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.TagHelpers.InputTagHelper.InputTypeName" />) or calculated "type" attribute value is <c>checkbox</c>,
            <c>hidden</c>, <c>password</c>, or <c>radio</c>.
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: name
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The name of the <input> element.
            </summary>
            <remarks>
            Passed through to the generated HTML in all cases. Also used to determine whether <see cref="P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.TagHelpers.InputTagHelper.For" /> is
            valid with an empty <see cref="P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.ViewFeatures.ModelExpression.Name" />.
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: value
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The value of the <input> element.
            </summary>
            <remarks>
            Passed through to the generated HTML in all cases. Also used to determine the generated "checked" attribute
            if <see cref="P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.TagHelpers.InputTagHelper.InputTypeName" /> is "radio". Must not be <c>null</c> in that case.
            </remarks>

TagHelpers.Name: Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.TagHelpers.LabelTagHelper

BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>

            </summary>
